segments.text: How do you usually get to school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually ride my bike . Which form of transport do you prefer to use ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel that I can see more when I pedal a bicycle , but when I feel lazy , I drive my car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we should discourage people from using their private cars . They produce too much pollution !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree , but I would find it difficult to stop using my car . It's just so convenient .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cars might be convenient , but they're so bad for the environment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I used to have one though . Once I started using my bicycle to get around , I found that I didn't really need it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe if I sold my car now , I wouldn't be so tempted to use it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could try . It would save you a lot of money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true . Every month , I spend hundreds of dollars on gas , insurance , and repairs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you got to class by riding a bicycle every day instead of driving , you will get lots of exercise , too !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could stand to lose a few pounds . Having a car has made me lazy . I never end up walking anywhere !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go to a car dealership . I'll help you try to sell your car for a good price .
segments.speaker: S2
